title: About the change on recurve bow on pbe
body: only i think is  a bit illogical it gives 10 PHYSICAL damage on hit? the 2 items that use recurvebow are {{item:3091}}  that do MAGICAL damage and {{item:3085}} that usually is bought by magical damage dealers with hit effect on kit ({{champion:10}} ), now only kalista of the ranged physical damage dealers buy it with success and runnan's dont have that +10 bonus hit. The new recurve bow should do magical damage on hit not physical.

replies.body: Runaan's has always had that 10 damage on-hit, it just goes largely unnoticed because it's also doing half of your AD along with all other on-hit effects.

I so agree that that item could use some help.  The bolts are really fun and nice on range with weaker wave clear but building it is painfull.

I agree, {{item:1043}} should start out dealing magic damage and should transition to physical damage on the appropriate items. One minor quirk the current on-hit physical damage is going to lead to is that it'll synergize with life steal, but won't anymore after upgrading it to an item like {{item:3091}} or {{item:3710}}. It's not that big a deal, but it's something that switching to magic damage could easily solve.
It's ok. You get a whole 15 more raw damage when upgrading it into Devourer, or even more when into Wit's End.
